website_summaries.verdict: With a familiar silhouette, the Taos offers people a classic yet high-quality sneaker with the Taos Rubber Soul. It has a nice look to it without it looking too shoddy or too casual. In terms of support, comfort, and how easy it is to put on, the sneaker has gotten approval from sneakerheads on these qualities.The Taos Rubber Soul though has been touted to be pricey for some but people seem to be in agreement that, for the price one pays, the sneakers are worth it for the support it offers.
pros: Buyers used the words “perfect,” “amazing,” and “lovely” to describe the Taos Rubber Soul
It has a lot of color options
Almost everyone who bought the sneakers said that it is very comfortable to wear
Many reviewers loved the fact that the shoe is easy to wear
One person said that he was so pleased with the Taos Rubber Soul’s footbed, he ordered two more of the sneakers
It has good arch support, most reviewers noted
Another reviewer said that the sneaker is perfect for traveling, and other activities that deal with much walking and standing
A good number of purchasers like how the high-quality construction is evident with just one glance at the Taos Rubber Soul
One person said that the sneaker looks good without it being sloppy
cons: A few people were hesitant to buy it because they found the Taos Rubber Soul pricey for a slip-on sneaker
One wearer commented on the heaviness of the sneaker when worn

customer_reviews.title: Why can't womens shoes accommodate a wide foot??!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lace up shoe from this manufacturer that is wonderful! I have a wide foot, in womens shoes this is a long road to haul, but I had this great shoe, came with wide with and had great arch support so I tried this slip on and was so excited to receive them but no. came and was the typical narrow fit of other brands. If you want a cute casual canvas slip on with some great arch support this is a great shoe. If you need a wider foot bed keep looking and if you find it let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: maybe a little heavy but not bad. I deal with plantar a lot and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I always read reviews and most of these said go up a size. Still I foolishly bought my regular size. the toe box is small and ultimately I wound up going with the next size up as I would advise. they are shipped from a local store in my city which I didn't know so I was able to go there for the exchange. As far as the shoe goes, it is well made, maybe a little heavy but not bad. I deal with plantar a lot and the arch support is good. I hope it stays that way after wear. So far I like them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Grothoff

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoe. I have high arches. Narrow heel and a wider toe box from wearing barefoot style running shoes. These shoes are great and comfortable. I do agree with all of the other reviews do go up. I am a 9.5 in all running shoes. Sandals. Cycling shoes etc. but got these in at 10. And they fit just right. I did compare them to the other flats they have I think they are the Tandy? And these have a much more forgiving toe box. I couldn’t wear the other style. It felt like I was wearing pointy toed flats.
customer_reviews.author: E.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes. I’ve been suffering from plantar fascitis for several months now and I’m starting to learn what shoes work and don’t work for me. These were a great purchase. These are casual and cute. The insoles are great! They provide great support and I can wear them for hours while still feeling comfortable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Heel slippage!
customer_reviews.text: I love Taos shoes. The colors, styles, and arch support are all exceptional. This is my fist try at their slip ons and I am disappointed to find that the heel of the shoe is super wide. These are cute, the length is perfect (I'm a Euro 42), but my heel just slides right out. It seems as if a slip on should have an even narrower heal than a lace up shoe, since there is no other way to secure the shoe on your foot. not the case with these shoes. Too bad...I love the color and style, but back they go!.
customer_reviews.author: Trumpet Diva

customer_reviews.title: Great brand!
customer_reviews.text: I have the Moc Star, lace up Taos brand of shoes and I wear a 9, got these in a 9 and they slip at the heel. I’m going to try the 8.5 as these are so comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.author: D. P. Cutlip-Rix

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Taos. I LOVE them. I’m a teacher and can wear them all day. The arch support is great and there is no breaking in needed. I wore them straight out the box all day with no blisters. I didn’t expect the black to be that denim-y and wish it was a little darker. Still a great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: EMS

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: I’m crazy about these shoes. They are super cute and go with so many things. They seem to run true to size. I wear a 5.5 but the smallest was a 6. So I ordered the 6 and they are too big. But where there’s a will there’s a way. By adding in some heel pads and some ball of the foot pads it makes them “fit”. Lol. I wish they made 5.5. I would order a few more. Worth it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Hoberty

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: My foot is a little wide, but not enough to order a wide width shoe. The Taos slip ons are SO comfortable and great quality. I got them for casual wear but have found myself wearing them for work because they feel so good on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: A. Detwiler

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, sturdy, nice-looking
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear Birkenstock but I can wear these for a whole day too, with no aching arches. And no one looks pointedly at my socks-in-sandals footwear :-)
customer_reviews.author: F. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Returned them
customer_reviews.text: I have many pairs of Taos shoes and love them but these were just all over uncomfortable and the heel rubbed up and down. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: Cute classic slip on sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Super cute classic slip on sneaker with great arch support! Unfortunately my heel would slip when walking, too much and would obviously create a blister if worn for any length of time, so I had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Betty

customer_reviews.title: Wish they had worked for me.
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute but they slipped on my heel so I had to send them back. Nice cushioning and nice arch without being too severe. One of them also had a flaw across the top. I may try a half size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Kzc

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support.
customer_reviews.text: Love the arch support in Taos shoes. I did order one size up due to having a wider foot. I did need a bigger size in the tie sneaker, but these felt looser. I highly recommend Taos shoes.
customer_reviews.author: KobiKatsMom

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable...
customer_reviews.text: These Taos slip ons are terrific! I have worn the Taos Plim Soles for awhile and love them but wanted something easy for around the house that still was comfortable, had arch support and looked nice...these are perfect....
customer_reviews.author: Shelphild

customer_reviews.title: Taos Slip ons
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are wonderful. Since knee, & hip surgery, I am only able to wear good shoes with a good arch. These shoes are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: K. Samenow

customer_reviews.title: Lovely kicks
customer_reviews.text: I have them in soft pink and they are simply lovely. Easy to slide into, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dahlia504

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I ended up throwing these away. They created incredible deep blisters on my heels. And they're supposed to be a comfort shoe?? Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are cute and comfortable. Good arch support, and not too narrow in the toes, which can be a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Mitts

customer_reviews.title: Great casual shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Perfect fit and super cute. I use insoles from the walking company because I need more arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Look just like vans!
customer_reviews.text: So cute ! They look just line vans that I can never wear because of the lack of support. Taos are so cute looking and I can stand all day in them! My favorite, order half a size up :)
customer_reviews.author: April Borja

customer_reviews.title: Seller is
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes if I can get the correct size! I’ve gotten the wrong size twice from shoe station...will update once I get the correct size. Great arc support and goes great with lots to outfits!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Super great pair of Shoes! So happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: tiffhood

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding support
customer_reviews.text: ARCH SUPPORT FTW! These are the kind of shoes my feet (and knees and hips) have been searching for. Yes, they're ridiculously expensive for casual shoes, but I'm thankful for the support, and to know that at least one company sees the need for it!
customer_reviews.author: HCL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and stylish. Really comfortable and I have problem feet. I wear them everyday. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Selby

customer_reviews.title: Second pair
customer_reviews.text: My feet are a little wider after having two babies, these fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Carlymu

customer_reviews.title: Slips on the heel
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfy. The problem is the heel slips when you walk. Can't wear for long, since they would irritate my heel. Would have returned, but I have worn them. The arch support is great.
customer_reviews.author: d p Smith (

customer_reviews.title: size wrong
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was way too big. Seemed like it was sized wrong. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Pac

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but I do need to use a liner-I wore barefoot and did have irritation. I have very sensitive feet- put Gekks in and all is fine!!
customer_reviews.author: Dewoolfs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoes
customer_reviews.text: i love my Taos shoes, The insole is the best I've ever worn, They wash well and hold their shape and color.
customer_reviews.author: glenna rose

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t care for fit
customer_reviews.text: Did not care for the fit. Too expensive for fit
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

customer_reviews.title: Wear with socks
customer_reviews.text: All is good, with one exception. If worn without socks the back of the shoe rubs behind the ankle. With socks, no blisters, very comfortable, good support
customer_reviews.author: Maureen P

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe! However was sent wrong size. The 9.5 was a 9. Wish it would've worked.
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Lovely shoes
customer_reviews.text: I liked them very much. They are just too tight on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoe if you want a cute sneaker with support
customer_reviews.text: A little too tight I’d you have a wide foot
customer_reviews.author: Devin Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this shoe to anyone. Great support and looks fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: sillybug

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable with a good arch support
customer_reviews.text: I really this shoe. Very comfortable with a good arch support. Only negative may be that they run a little short. I ordered my normal size but feel like my toe is right at the end. But feel like the next size would be to big.
customer_reviews.author: SMarker

product_meta.title: TAOS Womens Rubber Soul Wash Sneaker Pink
product_meta.description: TheTaos Rubber Soulis a casual women's canvas sneaker style slip-on shoe with elastic goring for a comfortable fit. These Taos Rubber Soul Pink Wash Canvas Women's Shoes have the following features: Upper Material Canvas Canvas sneaker has featuring arch and metatarsal support A thicker and higher platform Footbed Lining Canvas Footbed Treatment SILVADUR Antimicrobial Shield Forefoot Cushioning Insole Design Molded, Contoured Insole Material Polyurethane/canvas covered Metatarsal Support Outsole Flexible, durable rubber Removable Footbed Heel Height 1" Customer feedback suggests to go up one 1/2 size in this style
